thread.title: People Are Screaming After Nancy Kerrigan Was Told To "Break A Leg" On DWTS - BuzzFeed News
thread.title_full: People Are Screaming After Nancy Kerrigan Was Told To "Break A Leg" On DWTS - BuzzFeed News

author: Stephanie McNeal
title: People Are Screaming After Nancy Kerrigan Was Told To "Break A Leg" On DWTS - BuzzFeed News
text:
View this image › 
Twitter ID: 10751708 2. But wait…did she just say…break a leg? To Nancy Kerrigan? Of the infamous Tonya Harding leg breaking scandal? View this image › 
youtube.com If you have no idea what I’m talking about *cough* teens *cough*, read this .
ID: 10751794 3. People who saw the tweet were just like, OMG this is awk. .@kristiyamaguchi @NancyAKerrigan
— Stephen Miller (@redsteeze) ID: 10751821 4. OMG wat. I literally spit my drink out reading this.
— Calvin (@calvinstowell) ID: 10751823 5. Kristi…no. @kristiyamaguchi @NancyAKerrigan
— kylie sparks (@kyliesparks) ID: 10751827 6. This tweet is just stunning. @kristiyamaguchi @NancyAKerrigan
— Bottlerocket (@bottlerocket) ID: 10751832 7. Some gave Kristi the benefit of the doubt, and wondered if she just didn’t think about what she was saying. @kristiyamaguchi @NancyAKerrigan
— Batman (@Batmancanseeyou) ID: 10751844 8. But others were like, I see u Kristi. @kristiyamaguchi @NancyAKerrigan
— Belle Curves (@JaynePenelope) ID: 10751849 9. Could this be…a savage burn? .@kristiyamaguchi @NancyAKerrigan
— Eric Francisco (@EricTheDragon) ID: 10751851 10. Or a joke? .@kristiyamaguchi @NancyAKerrigan
— Abbi Crutchfield (@curlycomedy) ID: 10751862 11. Wow. @kristiyamaguchi
— Bryan Beltz (@bbeltz1) ID: 10751855 12. OMG. @kristiyamaguchi @NancyAKerrigan
— Boris Badenov (@DevilinGeorgia) ID: 10751863 13. BuzzFeed News has contacted Yamaguchi’s team for a response to the responses. In the meantime, please enjoy this one pure person who took the tweet at face value. @kristiyamaguchi she will be great! Cannot believe it's already been 9 years since your win!
— Natalie Sanders (@JudgeNatalie) ID: 10751872 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com! 
Stephanie McNeal is a social news editor for BuzzFeed News and is based in New York. Contact Stephanie McNeal at stephanie.mcneal@buzzfeed.com . Got a confidential tip? Submit it here .
